About CST Canteen

Nourishing Minds and Bodies Across Campus

Our Story



Serving the CST Community

The CST Canteen was established in 2015 with a simple mission: to provide nutritious, delicious, and affordable meals to students and faculty in a welcoming environment that promotes community bonding and academic success.

What began as a basic food service has evolved into a comprehensive dining experience. Recognizing the challenges students faced with long lines and limited time between classes, we launched our Easy Food System in 2023 - revolutionizing the campus dining experience through technology.

Today, our digital ordering system allows the entire campus community to browse menus, place orders, and make payments online, with their meals ready for pickup at their convenience. We've transformed from just a place to eat into an essential part of campus life and academic efficiency.

2015
CST Canteen Opens Its Doors
2018
Menu Expansion to Include Local Cuisine
2021
Nutritional Program Implementation
2023
Easy Food System Launch
